anith saththunta sapekshawa dirghama lama kalayak thiyenne minissunta.me lama kalayedi ee lamayinwa balaganna mawa ee aya langa radenna wenawa.ethakota mawage saha daruwange poshana karthawyaya sidda karanna thawa kenek awashya wenawa.ethendi thamayi ee sandaha wadi shakyathawayak sahitha pirimiya pawula kiyana sankalpya thulata ekathu wenne.anikuth sathwa kottasawala api pirimi sathage karyabharaya dakinne harima aduwen ho bohoma tika kalekata.
